name: Twin Shadow
description: '''George William Lewis Jr.''' (born March 30, 1983), better known by his stage name '''Twin Shadow''', is a Dominican-born American musician, producer, and actor. He has released six studio albums to date: ''[[Forget (Twin Shadow album)|Forget]]'' (2010), ''[[Confess (album)|Confess]]'' (2012), ''[[Eclipse (Twin Shadow album)|Eclipse]]'' (2015), ''[[Caer (album)|Caer]]'' (2018), ''[[Twin Shadow (album)|Twin Shadow]]'' (2021), and "Georgie" (2025).
